description:
小编导读：本周的词汇精选出自《老友记》哦！莱斯利曾经抛弃菲比单飞，去发展自己的歌唱事业。对此菲比一直耿耿于怀，现在当两个昔日好友重新碰面，会发生什么有趣的故事呢？一起来听听吧！

台词 ：

Chandler:All right, listen, I have to go to the bathroom. But the place with big fish comes up again.. I'd like to know whether that's several big fish or just one big fish.

Joey:So Phoebe tells us you write jingles.

Phoebe:Actually I said she abandoned me to write jingles.

Joey:Anything we might've heard of？Yeah.

Leslie:Home is never far away.

All:Home is Homestar Stew.

Leslie:Yeah, but I don't do that anymore. I got knd of sick of it. And then I couldn't come up with anything good, so they fired me.

Phoebe:Bummer.

钱德勒：好吧，我要上洗手间。 但是如果你们又谈到大鱼... 我想知道是有几条大鱼还是一条大鱼。

乔伊：菲比说你写广告歌。

菲比：事实上我是说她抛弃我去写广告歌。

乔伊：有没有我们听过的？

莱斯利：有的。家永远不远。

所有人：回家的感觉就是家星燉品。

莱斯利：但实际上我已经不写了，我有点厌倦这些。 再说我也写不出任何好的作品了，所以他们开了我。

菲比：太可惜了。

例句示范音频（BY好好）

The word "bum" is used as a noun to describe a person who is not interested in working and chooses to survive on meager resources. Sometimes we use this word to describe homeless people, but "bum" is applied to many different situations. “bum”这个单词经常作名词，用来形容一个人对工作提不起兴趣，依靠微薄的工资生存，有时候我们还用“bum”形容无家可归的人，但是“bum”可以运用到很多不同的情况下。

There are a couple of bums looking for something to eat from the garbage cans in the alley.很多流浪者在小巷的垃圾桶里寻找食物。

They say you shouldn't give money to a bum because he should learn how to earn his own income.他们说，你不应该给乞丐钱，因为他应该学会自己获取收入。

Our neighbor dresses like a bum even though he has a lot of money.我们的邻居打扮得像个乞丐，尽管他十分富有。

He met a bum while walking down the road.他走在路上，碰到了一个流浪乞丐。

Sometimes the word "bum" is used for people who are incompetent or careless:有时候“bum”用来形容某个人没有能力或是粗心：

That doctor is a bum. He gave me the wrong advice.这个医生真没用，给我的意见都不管用。

The governor is a bum. He should be replaced.这个统治者十分无能，应该被取代了。

Our waiter is a bum. He made a mistake on our order.我们的服务员很粗心，把菜单搞错了。

You can use the word "bum" as a verb to mean a person is wandering aimlessly, or a person is made to feel sad.我们还可以将“bum”用作动词，表示一个人漫无目的地徘徊，或是形容一个人十分忧伤。

Those kids are bumming around downtown.那些孩子在小镇上游荡。

Let's go to the mall and bum around.我们一起去购物中心转转吧！

I'm just bumming around the house today. 今天我绕屋子溜达了一圈。

They were bummed out when their team lost the game.得知他们队失败的消息后，他们十分伤心。

Stop talking about death. You're bumming me out! 不要再讲与死亡有关的内容了，你让我很难受！

The word "bummer" is used to describe a depressing situation:“bummer”可以用来形容令人沮丧的场景。

This is a bummer.真失望。

That movie was a bummer.这部电影真差劲。

Bummer.真遗憾。
